settings.text: This is the part where you might expect to roll your eyes at our delusions of grandeur, the bit where we promise you to save the planet through our greater-than-life mission. We think you’ve seen enough to know that this would be misguided. Instead, here’s what we can promise you hand on heart:

settings.title: The mission is you
settings.text: We focus on making you smile. Everything we do is to make you just a little bit happier. If we make your day 1% better, we’ve accomplished our mission.

settings.title: Only the good stuff
settings.text: Our products are as pure as they possibly can be. That means you get all the benefits of radical hydration, without ingesting any artificial additives.

settings.title: Do the right thing
settings.text: We don't cut corners. But we won't overwhelm you with information, either. So while our bottles are made of recycled plastic, you can take that for granted from us. Don’t even mention it.
